mission.title: Umgomo Wethu
mission.text: Sikholelwa ukuthi wonke umuntu ufanelwe ithuba lokufunda ukufunda. Inkundla yethu ihlinzeka ngemfundo yamahhala, efinyelelekayo yokufunda nokubhala ngezilimi zaseNingizimu Afrika nangaphezulu.

crisis.title: Inkinga Yokufunda Nokubhala
crisis.text: INingizimu Afrika ibhekene nezinga elilodwa elibi kakhulu lokufunda nokubhala phakathi kwamazwe afanayo. Ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi u-78% wabafundi beBanga 4 abakwazi ukufunda ngokuqonda.

causes.title: Kungani Lokhu Kwenzeka
causes.poverty: Ubuphofu bukhawulela ukufinyelela ezincwadini nasezinsizeni zokufunda

solution.title: Sisize Kanjani
solution.text: Inkundla yethu isebenzisa izindlela eziboniswe ukuze zisize abantu ukufunda ukufunda kunoma yimuphi ubudala.

footer.mission: Ukusiza abantu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bonke abase-Afrika ukufunda ukufunda, igama ngalinye ngesikhathi.
